definitions: time during which a broadcast is being transmitted

examples.text: advertising takes up half the airtime on that radio station

shortDefinitions: time during which broadcast is being transmitted

definitions: time during which a mobile phone is in use, including calls made and received.
shortDefinitions: time during which mobile phone is in use

definitions: the time a pilot or or aircraft spends in flight

examples.text: a relatively new pilot with just 100 hours of airtime

definitions: (in snowboarding, skiing, etc.) the time a person spends in the air during a jump

examples.text: a thirty-foot jump gave competitors plenty of airtime

shortDefinitions: time person spends in air during jump in skateboarding etc.
